title: GKM actions on almost quaternionic manifolds
abstract:
We introduce quaternionic structures on abstract GKM graphs, as the
combinatorial counterpart of almost quaternionic structures left invariant by a
torus action of GKM type. In the GKM$_3$ setting the 2-faces of the GKM graph
can naturally be divided into quaternionic and complex 2-faces; it turns out
that for GKM$_3$ actions on positive quaternion-K\"ahler manifolds the
quaternionic 2-faces are biangles or triangles, and the complex 2-faces
triangles or quadrangles. We show purely combinatorially that any abstract
GKM$_3$ graph with quaternionic structure satisfying this restriction on the
2-faces of the GKM graph is that of a torus action on quaternionic projective
space ${\mathbb{H}} P^n$ or the Grassmannian ${\mathrm{Gr}}_2({\mathbb{C}}^n)$
of complex 2-planes in ${\mathbb{C}}^n$.
